archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Bill Dispute notification
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation:
Bill dispute consists of handling the customer inquiries received through customer service, self care or any other channel about their bills that have not been solved by simple actions (e.g walk customer through their invoice or grant the request when disputed amount is inferior to a threshold).
ï¿½The dispute settlement results in customer notification of the results, dispute granted (for the whole disputed amount or part of it) or customer request denied.
